title: Cruise Down the Mighty Murray River on a Boutique Paddlesteamer
description: Step back in time as you board the PS Emmylou and cruise down the mighty Murray River. Begin in the town of Echuca and journey with Murray River Paddlesteamers on the only wood-fired Paddlesteamer in the world offering regular river cruises. Embrace old-world charm on this luxurious boutique cruise, where you will learn all about the local area and explore wineries, wetlands and more. Choose from a two, three or four-night cruise with optional room upgrades. Featuring all-inclusive dining with chef-prepared meals, local winery lunches, guided wetlands Eco-cruise, two bottles of complimentary wine and much more.
